languages.text: {n}Слова Ирлиэт свистят подобно разгневанной плети:{/n} "После всех предупреждений и разговоров, что мы вели, ты все же решил{mf||а} проявить свою низменную натуру. В тот самый момент, когда я помогла облегчить твою душу". {n}Эльдарка разочарованно качает головой.{/n} "Порой я задумывалась — можем ли мы прийти к полному пониманию? Однако твое поведение в глубинах собственной души показало, насколько мы далеки друг от друга. Довольно, элантах. Не пытайся больше пробраться в мою душу — отныне двери в нее плотно заперты".

{n}Yrliet's words are akin to the lashes of an enraged whip.{/n} "After all the warnings and conversations we had, you decide to show your lowly nature. And at the exact moment when I was helping to ease the burden on your soul." {n}She shakes her head in disappointment.{/n} "Sometimes I wonder — can we ever come to fully understand each other? But your actions in the depths of your soul have shown how different we are. Enough, elantach. Do not try to reach inside my soul ever again — its doors are tightly closed to you from now on."
languages.original_text: {n}Слова Ирлиэт свистят подобно разгневанной плети:{/n} "После всех предупреждений и разговоров, что мы вели, ты все же решил{mf||а} проявить свою низменную натуру. В тот самый момент, когда я помогла облегчить твою душу". {n}Эльдарка разочарованно качает головой.{/n} "Порой я задумывалась — можем ли мы прийти к полному пониманию? Однако твое поведение в глубинах собственной души показало, насколько мы далеки друг от друга. Довольно, элантах. Не пытайся больше пробраться в мою душу — отныне двери в нее плотно заперты".

traits.locale_text: {n}Yrliet's words are akin to an enraged whip's lashes.{/n} "After all the warnings and conversations that we've had, you decide to show your lowly nature. And at the same exact moment when I helped to ease the burden on your soul, too." {n}The Aeldari shakes her head in disappointment.{/n} Sometimes I wonder — can we ever come to fully understanding each other? But your actions inside the depths of your soul have shown how much we differ from each other. Enough, elantach. Do not try to get inside my soul ever again — its' doors are tightly closed for you from now on."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

traits.locale_text: {n}Yrliet's words are akin to an enraged whip's lashes.{/n} "After all the warnings and conversations that we've had, you decide to show your lowly nature. Do not try to get inside my soul ever again — its' doors are tightly closed for you from now on."

languages.text: {n}伊莉耶特的话语如同愤怒的鞭子般抽打在你的身上。{/n}“尽管我曾警告过你那么多次，可当我打算为你减轻心灵的重负时，你依然打算暴露你低贱的本性。”{n}她失望地摇了摇头。{/n}“有时我在想，我们真的能够彼此理解吗？你灵魂深处的丑态已经让我明白，我们根本不是一类人。到此为止吧，外界人。再也不要来打扰我的灵魂。从今往后，我的心扉绝不会再为你打开。”
languages.original_text: {n}Yrliet's words are akin to the lashes of an enraged whip.{/n} "After all the warnings and conversations we had, you decide to show your lowly nature. And at the exact moment when I was helping to ease the burden on your soul." {n}She shakes her head in disappointment.{/n} "Sometimes I wonder — can we ever come to fully understand each other? But your actions in the depths of your soul have shown how different we are. Enough, elantach. Do not try to reach inside my soul ever again — its doors are tightly closed to you from now on."

traits.locale_text: {n}伊莉耶特的话语如同愤怒的鞭子般抽打在你的身上。{/n}“尽管我曾警告过你那么多次，可当我打算为你减轻心灵的重负时，你依然打算暴露你低贱的本性。”{n}她失望地摇了摇头。{/n}“有时我在想，我们真的能够彼此理解吗？你灵魂深处的丑态已经让我明白，我们根本不是一类人。到此为止吧，外界人。再也不要来打扰我的灵魂。从今往后，我的心扉绝不会再为你打开。”
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: {n}Las palabras de Yrliet son como los azotes de un furioso látigo.{/n} «Después de todas las advertencias y conversaciones que hemos tenido, decides mostrar tus más bajos instintos. Y en el preciso instante en que intentaba ayudarte a aliviar las cargas de tu alma». {n}La Aeldari menea la cabeza decepcionada.{/n} «A veces me pregunto si alguna vez llegaremos a entendernos plenamente. Pero tus actos en las profundidades de tu alma me han mostrado lo diferentes que somos. Ya basta, elantach. No vuelvas a intentar penetrar en mi alma: a partir de ahora sus puertas están cerradas para ti».
languages.original_text: {n}Yrliet's words are akin to the lashes of an enraged whip.{/n} "After all the warnings and conversations we had, you decide to show your lowly nature. And at the exact moment when I was helping to ease the burden on your soul." {n}She shakes her head in disappointment.{/n} "Sometimes I wonder — can we ever come to fully understand each other? But your actions in the depths of your soul have shown how different we are. Enough, elantach. Do not try to reach inside my soul ever again — its doors are tightly closed to you from now on."

traits.locale_text: {n}Las palabras de Yrliet son como los azotes de un furioso látigo.{/n} «Después de todas las advertencias y conversaciones que hemos tenido, decides mostrar tus más bajos instintos. Y en el preciso instante en que intentaba ayudarte a aliviar las cargas de tu alma». {n}La Aeldari menea la cabeza decepcionada.{/n} «A veces me pregunto si alguna vez llegaremos a entendernos plenamente. Pero tus actos en las profundidades de tu alma me han mostrado lo diferentes que somos. Ya basta, elantach. No vuelvas a intentar penetrar en mi alma: a partir de ahora sus puertas están cerradas para ti».
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: {n}Les mots d'Yrliet claquent comme des coups de fouet.{/n} « Malgré toutes nos discussions et mes avertissements, vous avez décidé de me montrer votre nature vulgaire, juste au moment où j'essaie de vous libérer du fardeau qui pèse sur votre âme. » {n}Elle secoue la tête, déçue.{/n} « Parfois je me demande si nous serons un jour capables de nous comprendre mutuellement. Vos actions au plus profond de votre âme ont démontré à quel point nous sommes {mf|différents|différentes}. Ça suffit, elantach. N'essayez plus jamais de vous approcher de mon âme, ses portes vous seront désormais fermées. »
languages.original_text: {n}Yrliet's words are akin to the lashes of an enraged whip.{/n} "After all the warnings and conversations we had, you decide to show your lowly nature. And at the exact moment when I was helping to ease the burden on your soul." {n}She shakes her head in disappointment.{/n} "Sometimes I wonder — can we ever come to fully understand each other? But your actions in the depths of your soul have shown how different we are. Enough, elantach. Do not try to reach inside my soul ever again — its doors are tightly closed to you from now on."

traits.locale_text: {n}Les mots d'Yrliet claquent comme des coups de fouet.{/n} « Malgré toutes nos discussions et mes avertissements, vous avez décidé de me montrer votre nature vulgaire, juste au moment où j'essaie de vous libérer du fardeau qui pèse sur votre âme. » {n}Elle secoue la tête, déçue.{/n} « Parfois je me demande si nous serons un jour capables de nous comprendre mutuellement. Vos actions au plus profond de votre âme ont démontré à quel point nous sommes {mf|différents|différentes}. Ça suffit, elantach. N'essayez plus jamais de vous approcher de mon âme, ses portes vous seront désormais fermées. »
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: {n}Yrliets Worte treffen dich wie erzürnte Peitschenhiebe.{/n} "Nach all den Warnungen und unseren Gesprächen beschließt Ihr, Eure niedere Natur zu zeigen. Und das genau in dem Moment, als ich Euch half, die Bürde auf Eurer Seele zu lindern." {n}Sie schüttelt enttäuscht den Kopf.{/n} "Manchmal frage ich mich – werden wir einander jemals wirklich verstehen? Euer Handeln in den Tiefen Eurer Seele hat gezeigt, wie verschieden wir sind. Genug, Elantach! Versucht nie wieder, in meine Seele zu gelangen – ihre Türen sind für Euch von nun an fest verschlossen."
languages.original_text: {n}Yrliet's words are akin to the lashes of an enraged whip.{/n} "After all the warnings and conversations we had, you decide to show your lowly nature. And at the exact moment when I was helping to ease the burden on your soul." {n}She shakes her head in disappointment.{/n} "Sometimes I wonder — can we ever come to fully understand each other? But your actions in the depths of your soul have shown how different we are. Enough, elantach. Do not try to reach inside my soul ever again — its doors are tightly closed to you from now on."

traits.locale_text: {n}Yrliets Worte treffen dich wie erzürnte Peitschenhiebe.{/n} "Nach all den Warnungen und unseren Gesprächen beschließt Ihr, Eure niedere Natur zu zeigen. Und das genau in dem Moment, als ich Euch half, die Bürde auf Eurer Seele zu lindern." {n}Sie schüttelt enttäuscht den Kopf.{/n} "Manchmal frage ich mich – werden wir einander jemals wirklich verstehen? Euer Handeln in den Tiefen Eurer Seele hat gezeigt, wie verschieden wir sind. Genug, Elantach! Versucht nie wieder, in meine Seele zu gelangen – ihre Türen sind für Euch von nun an fest verschlossen."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: {n}ユリエットの言葉は、怒り狂った鞭を打ち付けるかのように響いた。{/n}「あれだけ警告し、会話を交わした後で、お前は卑しい本性を見せた。それも、我がお前の魂の重荷を和らげる手助けをしていたまさにその瞬間に」{n}彼女は落胆から首を振る。{/n}「時折思うのだ…我らはお互いを完全に理解し合えるようになるのだろうかと。だが、お前の魂の奥底にある行動は、我らがどれほど異なっているのかを示した。もういい、エランタよ。二度と我の魂の内側に手を伸ばそうとするな。今後、この扉はお前には堅く閉ざされるだろう」
languages.original_text: {n}Yrliet's words are akin to the lashes of an enraged whip.{/n} "After all the warnings and conversations we had, you decide to show your lowly nature. And at the exact moment when I was helping to ease the burden on your soul." {n}She shakes her head in disappointment.{/n} "Sometimes I wonder — can we ever come to fully understand each other? But your actions in the depths of your soul have shown how different we are. Enough, elantach. Do not try to reach inside my soul ever again — its doors are tightly closed to you from now on."

traits.locale_text: {n}ユリエットの言葉は、怒り狂った鞭を打ち付けるかのように響いた。{/n}「あれだけ警告し、会話を交わした後で、お前は卑しい本性を見せた。それも、我がお前の魂の重荷を和らげる手助けをしていたまさにその瞬間に」{n}彼女は落胆から首を振る。{/n}「時折思うのだ…我らはお互いを完全に理解し合えるようになるのだろうかと。だが、お前の魂の奥底にある行動は、我らがどれほど異なっているのかを示した。もういい、エランタよ。二度と我の魂の内側に手を伸ばそうとするな。今後、この扉はお前には堅く閉ざされるだろう」
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: {n}Yrliet'in sözleri, öfkeli bir kırbaç gibi vuruyor.{/n} "Onca konuşmadan ve uyarıdan sonra alçak tabiatını göstermeye karar verdin. Hem de ben ruhundaki ağırlığı hafifletmeye çalışırken." {n}Hayal kırıklığıyla başını sallıyor.{/n} "Bazen merak ediyorum, birbirimizi tam olarak anlayabilecek miyiz? Ruhunun derinliklerinde yaptıkların, ne kadar farklı olduğumuzu bana gösterdi. Yeter elantach. Bir daha asla ruhuma erişmeyi deneme, şu andan itibaren tüm kapılarım sana kapalı."
languages.original_text: {n}Yrliet's words are akin to the lashes of an enraged whip.{/n} "After all the warnings and conversations we had, you decide to show your lowly nature. And at the exact moment when I was helping to ease the burden on your soul." {n}She shakes her head in disappointment.{/n} "Sometimes I wonder — can we ever come to fully understand each other? But your actions in the depths of your soul have shown how different we are. Enough, elantach. Do not try to reach inside my soul ever again — its doors are tightly closed to you from now on."

traits.locale_text: {n}Yrliet'in sözleri, öfkeli bir kırbaç gibi vuruyor.{/n} "Onca konuşmadan ve uyarıdan sonra alçak tabiatını göstermeye karar verdin. Hem de ben ruhundaki ağırlığı hafifletmek için yardım ederken." {n}Hayal kırıklığıyla başını sallıyor.{/n} "Bazen merak ediyorum, birbirimizi tam olarak anlayabilecek miyiz? Ruhunun derinliklerinde yaptıkların bana ne kadar farklı olduğumuzu gösterdi. Yeter elantach. Bir daha asla ruhuma erişmeyi deneme, şu andan itibaren tüm kapılarım sana kapalı."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion
